tool_description: Live Brazilian agro business market prices.
name: agro-business-api
title: agro-business-api

api_list.name: Get - wheat prices
api_list.description:
This end point returns Brazilian product prices at the last 10 days.
Prices are in BRL (endpoint for conversion available)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://agro-business-api.p.rapidapi.com/wheat"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "agro-business-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get USD to BRL convertion
api_list.description: This endpoint returns live USD price converted to BRL Brazilian Real
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://agro-business-api.p.rapidapi.com/USD-BRL"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "agro-business-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
